definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
to see one's child die before oneself
pinyin: bai2 fa4 ren2 song4 hei1 fa4 ren2

sentences.english: I closed the window. I combed his long, black hair from his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 我關上窗，爲他梳理了額頭長長的黑髮。

sentences.english: A lock of dark hair curled across his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 一綹蓬鬆的黑髮彎曲地掛在他的前額上。

sentences.english: Black hair is a sharp contrast to the white skin.
sentences.chinese: 黑髮白膚形成鮮明的對照。

sentences.english: eg: She inherits her black hair from her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她的滿頭黑髮是從她母親那裏已傳過來的。

sentences.english: She has a beautiful black haire.
Her long black hair hung loosely about her shoulders .
sentences.chinese: 她那長長的黑髮鬆散地飄垂在雙肩上。

sentences.english: She had black hair, graying at the temples.
sentences.chinese: 她一頭黑髮，鬢角處開始變灰白了。

sentences.english: Simora girls from Future TV, full of black hair formation.
sentences.chinese: Simora從民視的女孩，豐滿的黑髮構成。

sentences.english: She used almost no makeup and wore her thick black hair unstyled and down.
sentences.chinese: 她幾乎不化妝，濃密的黑髮自然披落。

sentences.english: Her dark hair waved untidy across her broad forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她的黑髮散亂地飄拂在寬闊的腦門子上。

sentences.english: They would say that she is not worthy of possessing her shiny black hair and dark 4)almond eyes.
sentences.chinese: 會說她不配擁有亮澤的黑髮和深色的杏眼。

sentences.english: Under the tree was sitting a beautiful dark-haired girl .
sentences.chinese: 樹下坐着一位美麗的黑髮女郎。

sentences.english: With black hair and green eyes, with a lightning scar shape.
sentences.chinese: 有着黑髮綠眼，頭上有一道閃電形傷疤。

sentences.english: Walnut: moisten the skin, black hair and beard, nourish the liver and kidney, strengthen the muscle and bone.
sentences.chinese: 能滋潤肌膚，烏須黑髮，滋補肝腎，強筋健骨。

definition: one head/a head full of sth/one end (of a stick)/one side/headlong/directly/rapidly/simultaneously
plait/braid/pigtail/a mistake or shortcoming that may be exploited by an opponent/handle/CL:根[gen1],條|条[tiao2]
beard/mustache or whiskers/facial hair/CL:撮[zuo3],根[gen1]/(coll.) bandit
